Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Diablo in 1977...
Injured on 4/16/1978 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1981...
Injured on 6/24/1985 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/16/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $1,793,200 per year...
